title: Update
body: Hi, this is a humble request to update Narada to the latest version as the version you are currently using will not be supported for long. Thank you.

data.body: Hi, we've removed Waaree for now and will add it back as soon as the load comes under a manageable level. Sorry for the inconvenience caused, especially for the server crash that happened. Thanks!
data.markdown_body: Hi, we've removed Waaree for now and will add it back as soon as the load comes under a manageable level. Sorry for the inconvenience caused, especially for the server crash that happened. Thanks!
